name: Winning Post 8 (2015)
description:
In 2015, the opening of a hot horse racing drama!
In "Winning Post 8" released in March 2014 as the culmination of the 20th anniversary of the series, "Winning Post 8 2015" that incorporates various new elements and data that reflects the latest horse racing world has appeared.

While aiming to clear the goal, it is possible to fully enjoy the real pleasure of this work that connects the pedigree (female line) of the breeding mare and the blood relationship of the person. Many dramatic events have been added to color the horse racing life, such as the world summit decisive battle with top overseas horse owners and episodes depicting marriage with a secretary. We are the first to respond to the latest horse racing information such as the star horses that are attracting attention in the horse racing scene in 2014 and the recording of the races that will be newly established in 2015. The graphics and direction of the ranch have been enhanced so that you can enjoy the scenery of the ranch just by looking at it. In addition, we have realized a wider variety of production and training, such as preparing a new training method for the greatest conquest. Equipped with a "future scenario" where the story starts in 2016. The history of horse racing of "IF" unfolds in the horse racing world where star horses are breeding in recent years. Equipped with a "historical horse battle" mode for incandescent online battles. You can enjoy racing with rivals all over the country with real famous horses as well as your favorite horses.
